<[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/VMT-state-of-multi-cloud-1]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Analysts and experts predict that the end state of the current IT evolution is Hybrid Cloud, defined as an architecture in which both private and public infrastructure resources are utilized and networked to enable complete, on-demand workload portability. Despite this projection, few if any organizations have achieved this end state.
This survey is the first in a series of four, conducted by Verizon & VMTurbo, which will collectively establish a baseline for where organizations currently are along this journey, and establish a framework for proceeding on the path to Hybrid Cloud over the next 3 years.
Your participation in this survey is integral to the completion of a seminal document that will serve to benefit a multitude of enterprises as they devise and execute their strategy. This survey will take approximately twelve (12) minutes to complete. For your time, you will be entered for a chance to win one (1) of ten (10) $100 Amazon Gift Cards.* Thank you for your participation.
